Title: Chaos Game
Description: The chaos game is a way to make fractals through a random walk. You start with vertices and initialize a cursor to a random vertex. From there, you pick a vertex at random again and move towards that vertex some percentage amount and plot a point. Repeat many many times and you'll get a fractal. Using different numbers of points in different configurations with different percentage movements results in different fractals. Python scripts are provided to view different fractals.
Author: Demofox
